title: MYB
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Alphabet Spins Off Taara, A Laser-Powered Starlink Rival
items.description: With satellite internet facing new competition, Taara’s laser-based technology offers a different path to global connectivity.

items.description: The latest iPhone software is barely a week old, but some users are saying it’s causing key software to break.

items.title: This AI Startup From Harvard Students Is Arming Soldiers For Electronic Warfare
